data_directory: This directory has raw data under data_directory/case_00/ [ex] $HOME/Desktop/data/Abdomen
modelweight_path: The modelweight suitable for input_size patch. [ex] $HOME/Desktop/data/modelweight/Abdomen/28-44-44-1/mask/with_pad/fold1/latest.pkl
input_size: The patch size for trained model. [ex] 32-32-32
